00023         abstract class ActiveRecord
00024         {
00025                 static $columns = array();
00026                 static $class_initialized = array();
00027                 static $belongs_to_classes = array();
00028                 static $has_many_classes = array();
00029                 
00030                 protected $table_name;
00031                 protected $primary_key = 'id';
00032                 private $values;
00033                 
00045                 function ActiveRecord($_values = NULL)
00046                 {
00047                         global $db;
00048                         
00049                         $classname = get_class($this);
00050                         $initialized = self::_is_initialized($classname);
00051                         if (!$initialized)
00052                         {
00053                                 $db->prepare("DESCRIBE `{1}`",
00054                                         $this->get_table_name());
00055                                 $db->exec();
00056                                 $columns = array();
00057                                 while ($row = $db->fetch_assoc())
00058                                 {
00059                                         $columns[] = $row['Field'];
00060                                 }
00061                                 self::_set_columns($classname, $columns);
00062                                 self::_set_initialized($classname, TRUE);
00063                         }
00064                         $columns = self::_get_columns($classname);
00065                         if (!empty($_values))
00066                         {
00067                                 $this->values = array();
00068                                 foreach ($_values as $key => $val)
00069                                 {
00070                                         $keyexists = in_array($key, $columns);
00071                                         if ($keyexists)
00072                                         {
00073                                                 $this->values[$key] = (get_magic_quotes_gpc()) ? stripslashes($val) : $val;
00074                                         }
00075                                 }
00076                         }
00077                         $this->init($_values);
00078                 }
00079                 
00086                 protected function init($values)
00087                 {
00088                 }

00098                 private function get_table_name()
00099                 {
00100                         if (!$this->table_name)
00101                         {
00102                                 $classname = get_class($this);
00103                                 $this->table_name = class_name_to_table_name($classname);
00104                         }
00105                         return $this->table_name;
00106                 }

00116                 private function get_foreign_key_name()
00117                 {
00118                         if (empty($this->foreign_key_name))
00119                         {
00120                                 $classname = get_class($this);
00121                                 $this->foreign_key_name = class_name_to_foreign_key($classname);
00122                         }
00123                         return $this->foreign_key_name;
00124                 }

00133                 private function get_primary_key()
00134                 {
00135                         if (!$this->primary_key)
00136                         {
00137                                 $this->primary_key = 'id';
00138                         }
00139                         return $this->primary_key;
00140                 }

00147                 private function has_column($key)
00148                 {
00149                         $classname = get_class($this);
00150                         $columns = self::_get_columns($classname);
00151                         return in_array($key, $columns);
00152                 }

00159                 public function belongs_to($table_name)
00160                 {
00161                         $classname = get_class($this);
00162                         $columns = self::_get_columns($classname);
00163                         $ownerclass = table_name_to_class_name($table_name);
00164                         $owner = eval("return new {$ownerclass}();");
00165                         if (in_array(table_name_to_foreign_key($table_name), $columns))
00166                         {
00167                                 $owner->find_by_id($this->values[table_name_to_foreign_key($table_name)]);
00168                         }
00169                         else if (in_array($owner->foreign_key_name, $columns))
00170                         {
00171                                 $owner->find_by_id($this->values[$owner->foreign_key_name]);
00172                         }
00173                         $this->values[singularize($table_name)] = $owner;
00174                         $owner->values[singularize($this->table_name)] = $this;
00175                 }
00176 
00184                 public function has_many($table_name, $params = array())
00185                 {
00186                         $childclass = table_name_to_class_name($table_name);
00187                         $obj = eval("return new {$childclass}();");
00188                         $fkey = $this->get_foreign_key_name();
00189                         if (isset($params['where_clause']))
00190                         {
00191                                 $params['where_clause'] .= " AND `{$fkey}` = '{$this->values[$this->primary_key]}' ";
00192                         }
00193                         else
00194                         {
00195                                 $params['where_clause'] = "`{$fkey}` = '{$this->values[$this->primary_key]}' ";
00196                         }
00197                         $children = $obj->find_all($params);
00198                         if (count($children) > 0)
00199                         {
00200                                 foreach ($children as $child)
00201                                 {
00202                                         $child->values[singularize($this->table_name)] = $this;
00203                                 }
00204                                 $this->values[$table_name] = $children;
00205                         }
00206                 }
00207                 
00215                 public function has_and_belongs_to_many($table_name, $params = array())
00216                 {
00217                         global $db;
00218                         
00219                         $peerclass = table_name_to_class_name($table_name);
00220                         $peer = eval("return new {$peerclass}();");
00221                         $fkey = $this->get_foreign_key_name();
00222                         $peer_fkey = $peer->get_foreign_key_name();
00223                         
00224                         // By convention, relation table name is the union of
00225                         // the two member tables' names joined by an underscore
00226                         // in alphabetical order
00227                         $table_names = array($table_name, $this->table_name);
00228                         sort($table_names);
00229                         $relation_table = implode('_', $table_names);
00230                         
00231                         $db->prepare("SELECT * FROM `{1}` WHERE `{2}` = '{3}'",
00232                                 $relation_table,
00233                                 $fkey,
00234                                 $this->values[$this->primary_key]);
00235                         $db->exec();
00236                         //print_r($db->query);
00237                         if ($db->num_rows() > 0)
00238                         {
00239                                 $this->values[$table_name] = array();
00240                                 while ($row = $db->fetch_assoc())
00241                                 {
00242                                         $peer = eval("return new {$peerclass}();");
00243                                         $peer->find_by_id($row[$peer_fkey]);
00244                                         $this->values[$table_name][] = $peer;
00245                                         $peer->values[$this->table_name] = array($this);
00246                                         //print_r($peer);
00247                                 }
00248                         }
00249                 }
00250                 
00258                 public function has_one($table_name)
00259                 {
00260                         $childclass = table_name_to_class_name($table_name);
00261                         $obj = eval("return new {$childclass}();");
00262                         $fkey = $this->get_foreign_key_name();
00263                         $children = $obj->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`{$fkey}` = {$this->values[$this->primary_key]}", 'limit' => 1));
00264                         if (count($children) > 0)
00265                         {
00266                                 $child = $children[0];
00267                                 $child->values[singularize($this->table_name)] = $this;
00268                                 $this->values[singularize($table_name)] = $child;
00269                         }
00270                 }

00283                 public function find_by_query($query)
00284                 {
00285                         global $db;
00286                         
00287                         $db->prepare($query);
00288                         $db->exec();
00289                         if ($db->num_rows() > 0)
00290                         {
00291                                 $ids = array();
00292                                 while ($row = $db->fetch_assoc())
00293                                 {
00294                                         $ids[] = $row[$this->primary_key];
00295                                 }
00296                                 $classname = get_class($this);
00297                                 $results = array();
00298                                 foreach ($ids as $id)
00299                                 {
00300                                         $obj = eval("return new {$classname}();");
00301                                         $obj->find_by_id($id);
00302                                         $results[] = $obj;
00303                                 }
00304                                 return $results;
00305                         }
00306                         else
00307                         {
00308                                 // throw new Exception... PHP 5 only
00309                                 return NULL;
00310                         }
00311                 }

00320                 function find_all($params = array())
00321                 {
00322                         global $db;
00323                         
00324                         if (empty($params['where_clause']))
00325                         {
00326                                 $params['where_clause'] = '1';
00327                         }
00328                         if (empty($params['order_by']))
00329                         {
00330                                 $params['order_by'] = "`{$this->primary_key}` ASC";
00331                         }
00332                         if (empty($params['limit']))
00333                         {
00334                                 $params['limit'] = 999;
00335                         }
00336                         if (empty($params['start']))
00337                         {
00338                                 $params['start'] = 0;
00339                         }
00340                         
00341                         $db->prepare("SELECT * FROM `{1}` WHERE (1 AND ({$params['where_clause']})) ORDER BY {$params['order_by']} LIMIT {$params['start']}, {$params['limit']}",
00342                                 $this->get_table_name());
00343                         $db->exec();
00344                         if ($db->num_rows() > 0)
00345                         {
00346                                 $ids = array();
00347                                 while ($row = $db->fetch_assoc())
00348                                 {
00349                                         $ids[] = $row[$this->primary_key];
00350                                 }
00351                                 $classname = get_class($this);
00352                                 $results = array();
00353                                 foreach ($ids as $id)
00354                                 {
00355                                         $obj = eval("return new {$classname}();");
00356                                         $obj->find_by_id($id);
00357                                         $results[] = $obj;
00358                                 }
00359                                 return $results;
00360                         }
00361                         else
00362                         {
00363                                 // throw new Exception... PHP 5 only
00364                                 return NULL;
00365                         }
00366                 }

00378                 {
00379                         $obj = new $classname();
00380                         $obj->find_by_id($id);
00381                         return $obj;

00391                 public function find_by_id($id)
00392                 {
00393                         global $db;
00394                         
00395                         $db->prepare("SELECT * FROM `{1}` WHERE `{$this->primary_key}` = '{2}' LIMIT 1",
00396                                 $this->get_table_name(),
00397                                 $id);
00398                         $db->exec();
00399                         if ($db->num_rows() > 0)
00400                         {
00401                                 $classname = get_class($this);
00402                                 $columns = self::_get_columns($classname);
00403                                 $values = $db->fetch_assoc();
00404                                 foreach ($columns as $column)
00405                                 {
00406                                         $this->values[$column] = $values[$column];
00407                                 }
00408                         }
00409                         else
00410                         {
00411                                 return FALSE;
00412                         }
00413                         return TRUE;
00414                 }

00425                 function save()
00426                 {
00427                         global $db;
00428                         
00429                         $classname = get_class($this);
00430                         $columns = self::_get_columns($classname);
00431 
00432                         $nonempty = array();
00433                         for ($i = 0; $i < count($columns); $i++)
00434                         {
00435                                 if (isset($this->values[$columns[$i]]))
00436                                 {
00437                                         $nonempty[] = $columns[$i];
00438                                 }
00439                         }
00440 
00441                         if (!empty($this->values[$this->primary_key]))
00442                         {
00443                                 $query = "UPDATE `{1}` SET ";
00444                                 for ($i = 0; $i < count($nonempty); $i++)
00445                                 {
00446                                         $query .= "`{$nonempty[$i]}` = '{$db->escape($this->values[$nonempty[$i]])}'";
00447                                         if ($i < count($nonempty) - 1)
00448                                         {
00449                                                 $query .= ", ";
00450                                         }
00451                                 }
00452                                 $query .= " WHERE `{$this->primary_key}` = '{2}' LIMIT 1";
00453                                 $db->prepare($query,
00454                                         $this->get_table_name(),
00455                                         $this->values[$this->primary_key]);
00456                                 $db->exec();
00457                         }
00458                         else
00459                         {
00460                                 $query = "INSERT INTO `{1}` (";
00461                                 for ($i = 0; $i < count($nonempty); $i++)
00462                                 {
00463                                         $query .= "`{$nonempty[$i]}`";
00464                                         if ($i < count($nonempty) - 1)
00465                                         {
00466                                                 $query .= ", ";
00467                                         }
00468                                 }
00469                                 $query .= ") VALUES (";
00470                                 for ($i = 0; $i < count($nonempty); $i++)
00471                                 {
00472                                         $query .= "'{$db->escape($this->values[$nonempty[$i]])}'";
00473                                         if ($i < count($nonempty) - 1)
00474                                         {
00475                                                 $query .= ", ";
00476                                         }
00477                                 }
00478                                 $query .= ")";
00479                                 $db->prepare($query,
00480                                         $this->get_table_name());
00481                                 $db->exec();
00482                                 $this->values[$this->primary_key] = $db->insert_id();
00483                         }
00484                         return TRUE;
00485                 }

00496                 function delete($optimize = TRUE)
00497                 {
00498                         global $db;
00499                         
00500                         if (!empty($this->values[$this->primary_key]))
00501                         {
00502                                 $db->prepare("DELETE FROM `{1}` WHERE `{$this->primary_key}` = '{2}' LIMIT 1",
00503                                         $this->get_table_name(),
00504                                         $this->values[$this->primary_key]);
00505                                 $db->exec();
00506                                 
00507                                 // Clean up
00508                                 if ($optimize)
00509                                 {
00510                                         $db->prepare("OPTIMIZE TABLE `{1}`",
00511                                                 $this->get_table_name());
00512                                         $db->exec();
00513                                 }
00514                         }
00515                 }

00522                 function permalink($relative = TRUE)
00523                 {
00524                         $relative_url = $this->relative_url();
00525                         return $relative ?
00526                                 $relative_url : sprintf('http://%s%s',
00527                                         $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'],
00528                                         $relative_url);

00536                 function __set($key, $value)
00537                 {
00538                         if ($this->has_column($key))
00539                         {
00540                                 $this->values[$key] = $value;
00541                         }
00542                         else
00543                         {
00544                                 $this->$key = $value;
00545                         }
00546                 }
00547 
00548                 function __get($key)
00549                 {
00550                         if (array_key_exists($key, $this->values))
00551                         {
00552                                 return $this->values[$key];
00553                         }
00554                         else if (isset($this->$key))
00555                         {
00556                                 return $this->$key;
00557                         }
00558                         return NULL;
00559                 }
00560                 
00561                 function __isset($key)
00562                 {
00563                         if (empty($this->values))
00564                         {
00565                                 return FALSE;
00566                         }
00567                         if (array_key_exists($key, $this->values))
00568                         {
00569                                 return TRUE;
00570                         }
00571                         else if (isset($this->$key))
00572                         {
00573                                 return TRUE;
00574                         }
00575                         return FALSE;
00576                 }

00583                 static function _is_initialized($classname)
00584                 {
00585                         if (!isset(self::$class_initialized[$classname]))
00586                         {
00587                                 return FALSE;
00588                         }
00589                         return self::$class_initialized[$classname];

00593                 {
00594                         self::$columns[$classname] = $cols;

00597                 static function _get_columns($classname)
00598                 {
00599                         if (!isset(self::$class_initialized[$classname]))
00600                         {
00601                                 return NULL;
00602                         }
00603                         return self::$columns[$classname];
00604                 }
